name: Neilaggs Without Wi-Fi
description:
This game was made for the Summer 2021 Opera GX Game Jam on GameJolt and was originally uploaded to GameJolt too (The task was to make a no internet game for the Opera GX browser with the UFO theme)

LEFT CLICK to start in singleplayer, RIGHT CLICK to start in local multiplayer!

You can use the ARROW KEYS or WASD to move during singleplayer, but during multiplayer you use the ARROW KEYS to control player 1 and WASD to control player 2!

What do you think about the game? Leave your thoughts in the comments! What's your high score?
